title: The Chief Techincal Director (Transfer Of Refrences) Act, 2000
title_en: The Chief Techincal Director (Transfer Of Refrences) Act, 2000
short_name: Chief Techincal Director (Transfer Of Refrences) Act, 2000

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Chief Technical Director Short title.
  (Transfer of Functions and Change of Statutory References)
  Act, 2000.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. The powers, duties and responsibilities vested in the II'ransfer
                                                              functions
                                                                         of
  Chief Technical Director are hereby vested in the Chief of Chief
  Executive Officer of the National Works Agency and any {{"   ?'
  reference (however expressed) to the Chief Technical Direc- ,",
                                                                  Officer.
2              [No. 8)             The Chief Technical Director (Transfer of
                                            References) Act, 2000
               tor in any Act or regulation shall be construed as a reference
               to the Chief Executive Officer of the National Works
               Agency.
